source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_00<tab>The impatient moogle appears to have reached the end of his tether.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_00<tab>白亜の宮殿のきりきりモーグリは、心配事があるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_01<tab>The impatient moogle tells you that his three young charges have disappeared into the dragon-infested wastes of Ohl Tahn, seeking to emulate the adventurers they idolize. He implores you follow the young moogles into this den of danger, and save them from themselves.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_01<tab>きりきりモーグリの話を聞いた。冒険者に憧れたモーグリたちが、冒険するためにオール・ターンへ向かってしまったようだ。ドラヴァニア雲海のオール・ターンにいるモーグリたちを探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_02<tab>You find the adventurous mooglings and convince them to return to their master. Head back to Zenith to ensure that they have all returned safely to the impatient moogle's side.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_02<tab>モーグリたちを見つけた。白亜の宮殿の「きりきりモーグリ」に伝えよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_03<tab>The impatient moogle thanks you for rescuing his charges, before lambasting them for their reckless behavior. However, it seems that your successful rescue effort has only served to increase their admiration for adventurers. Knowing full well that it will further test their master's meager patience, the undeterred trio head out on another exciting adventure.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_03<tab>きりきりモーグリに報告した。冒険者に憧れたモーグリ族たちは懲りた様子もなく、ますます冒険者に憧れてしまったようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_000<tab>Oh, adventurer! It's awful! It's terrible! It's infuriating, kupo! My three young charges have flown off into the wild wastes of Ohl Tahn!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_000大変くぽ、大変くぽ！　命知らずもいいとこくぽ！
冒険者さん、急いで頼みたいことがあるくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_001<tab>They've been watching you adventurers heading over there to face the dragons, and the reckless little rascals thought to try it for themselves, kupo! Please, adventurer─you've got to bring them back before it's too late!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_001冒険者に憧れたモーグリたちが、気性の荒いドラゴン族がいる、
「オール・ターン」へ、冒険しに行っちゃったくぽ！
とっても心配だから、連れ戻してほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_010<tab>Ohl Tahn's full of dragons, dinosaurs, wyverns, and worse! It's no place for a moogle, particularly not a trio of puny scamps like them. Oh, adventurer, I'm so worried about them! Please say you'll bring them back to me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_010冒険者に憧れたモーグリたちが、気性の荒いドラゴン族がいる、
「オール・ターン」へ、冒険しに行っちゃったくぽ！
とっても心配だから、連れ戻してほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_020<tab>Kupooo! It's a real-life adventurer! I bet you're not tired at all, are you? I'm so pooped I can barely lift my pom-pom... I think I'm going to have to call it a day.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_020冒険者さん……くぽ？　すごいくぽ！
まったく疲れてないくぽ……モグはすごい疲れたくぽ。
今日のところは、もう帰るくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_021<tab>I can't go on, kupo─it's so scary out here! I don't know how you adventurers do it! ...He asked you to bring me back to Zenith? You don't have to tell me twice─I'm going to fly back as fast as my wings will carry me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_021くぽ……これ以上は怖いくぽ……。
冒険者の勇気に感服……くぽ。
帰れというなら……すぐに帰るくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_022<tab>Kupo, kupo, kupooo! Isn't adventuring fun? There are dragons everywhere, but I'm not scared at all! The next time I go on an adventure, I'm going to pull one's tail!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_022ふっふっふくぽ、冒険は楽しいくぽ。
でも、ドラゴン族がいっぱいいるから、
怖くはないけど帰るくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_030<tab>Adventurers never seem to get tired, kupo... <sigh> I wish I was strong like you...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_030冒険者さんは、体力がすごいくぽ！
かっこいいくぽ～。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_031<tab>It takes a braver moogle than me to become an adventurer, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_031<tab>冒険者の勇気……あこがれるくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_032<tab>Did you come looking for us just because he asked you to? That's the adventuring spirit right there, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_032モグたちを探しにくるなんて優しいくぽ。
さすが冒険者くぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_040<tab>Thank you for bringing them back from that dreadful place, adventurer! It's a wonder the fluff-headed fools didn't get themselves eaten, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_040冒険者さん、ありがとうくぽ。
オール・ターンまで行って、何もなかったのは幸運くぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_041<tab>Do you hear me? I've had about as much of your nonsense as I'm going to take, kupo! No more adventures, alright?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_041もう、無茶したらだめくぽ！
わかったくぽ！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_042<tab>...B-But how are we ever going to become adventurers if you don't let us practice!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_042<tab>……モ、モグたちも、冒険者さんみたいになりたいくぽー！

TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_043わー！　また行っちゃったくぽ―！
戻ってくるくぽ―！
